name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Raymond McCLENDON, Appellant

PER CURIAM.
Judgments of Sentence Affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 499
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Raymond McCLENDON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 13, 1982.
Decided May 25, 1982.
Michael G. DeFino, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
